question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/counters.rs] [Static: NUM_EXECUTOR_SHARDS] [Configuration Mismatch] Can Byzantine validators report different NUM_EXECUTOR_SHARDS values at line 11 causing validators to use incompatible shard configurations, leading to state divergence and chain splits?
